The Email Marketing Glossary

Your guide to all the acronyms and terms in the email world you always wanted. A project from Jason Rodriguez, The Better Email, and a bunch of email friends. Contribute on GitHub.

Customer Acquisition Cost

Also known as: CAC

How much it costs to acquire a new customer. The lower the better.

Additional Resources

  • Customer Acquisition Cost, Corporate Finance Institute
  • What is customer acquisition cost? How to calculate and reduce it., Shopify
